Writer: Peter Farrelly (characters), Bennett Yellin (characters), Bobby Farrelly (characters), Robert Brener (story), Robert Brener (screenplay), Troy Miller (screenplay)
Title: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Plot: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.
Actors: Timothy Stack, Mimi Rogers, Wayne Federman, Lucas Gregory
